keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must take money back into the banks. A publicly accountable system of creating money directly for public benefit.
NHS under threat from EU-US trade deal. We should keep our public service out of the TTIP.
We need affordable, secure homes for everyone. Scrap bedroom tax. Build more council houses; cap rents.
Cutting carbon is good for jobs and the economy. We need a nationwide insulation programme, energy saving technology, funded by the Green New Deal.
Education is a right not a privilege. We oppose tuition fees, campaign for a comprehensive system and for education to inspire creativity.
Oppose mass surveillance of our politics and our daily lives. Repeal anti-trade union laws.
